CustomField.formula: RecordType_Code__c & TEXT(FinServ__Account__r.Customer_Data_Country__c) & TEXT(FinServ__Account__r.Identification_Type__c) & FinServ__Account__r.Customer_ID__c & TEXT(FinServ__RelatedAccount__r.Customer_Data_Country__c) & TEXT(FinServ__RelatedAccount__r.Identification_Type__c) & FinServ__RelatedAccount__r.Customer_ID__c & IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = "RelatedParties", TEXT(Parties_Code__c), "") & IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = "SupplyChain", TEXT(FinServ__Role__r.SupplyChain_Type__c), "") & IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = "SupplyChain", Year__c, "") & IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = "Affiliate", IF(INCLUDES(Affiliate_Code__c, "A"), "A", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Affiliate_Code__c, "B"), "B", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Affiliate_Code__c, "C"), "C", "") , "")
CustomField.label: 關係Key值
